distant heat is an annual event
pulsating with electronic dance music
beneath a giant silver cubed adorned
with flashing lights and computer
screens a thousand dance fans have
gathered on a hilltop above the Red Sea
for seven years its backdrop was the
spectacular Wadi Rum setting for the
1962 epic Lawrence of Arabia but there
were disagreements about whether it was
too loud and too disruptive for other
tourists and local Bedouins this year it
moved to the Gulf of Aqaba halfway
between Saudi Arabia and Israel and
